name: OR_LNLG_LASER_STAFF_AWARE
description: This table contains whether the staff are aware of the safety policy for the laser safety checklist.

columns.name: LASER_SAFETY_CHECKLIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LSC_STAFF_AWARE_SFTY_POLICY_C_NAME
columns.description: Documents that the staff are aware of the laser safety policy.
